function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Frequent cases of occlusions, overlaps, and crowded zones in the dataset","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Benchmarking tests and comparisons conducted on a single hardware and software platform","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Training on a large number of samples from the google open images dataset, including human body parts, increases the risk of model overfitting to specific characteristics of that dataset and may not generalize well to other datasets.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilizing a transfer learning approach with pre-trained models may introduce biases and assumptions from the source dataset microsoft coco into the human detection model, leading to biased predictions and potential fairness issues.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using stochastic gradient descent sgd with warm restarts and a cosine annealing learning rate schedule may lead to challenges in hyperparameter tuning and model convergence, as well as the need for careful adjustment of learning rate values.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through close human interaction and contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate training data for human detection model","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the geometric transformation and mapping in the context of computer vision","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using euclidean distance in 2d space for inter-people distance estimation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through close contact with detected humans in public places.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mosaic data augmentation, class label smoothing, and dropblock regularisation in the input part of the detection module","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of the simple online and real-time sort tracking technique for people tracking and id assignment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on the hungarian optimization technique for assigning unique id numbers to individuals","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of complex mathematical equations may lead to errors in implementation or understanding.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overfitting may occur due to the use of specific techniques such as dropblock and class label smoothing.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of multi-scale detection techniques may increase computational resource requirements","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient spatial pooling operations may impact the accuracy and efficiency of the model","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of selective search and region proposal for two-stage detectors may introduce potential biases in object detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential difficulty in dealing with low-resolution images","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in detecting small objects in images","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Loss of local information during feature extraction process","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of dense models and multiple layers may increase the complexity of the model, making it harder to train.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection of a backbone architecture with a higher number of parameters may lead to increased complexity and resource requirements.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of data augmentation techniques such as mosaic may create a false sense of data variety and lead to overfitting if not used carefully","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Noisy estimation of mean and variance in batch normalization due to batch size reduction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection and evaluation of activation functions may result in suboptimal model performance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of the system on all types of cctv surveillance cameras","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on large training datasets for people detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inherent limitations of object detection models and algorithms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on accuracy of people detection and inter-people distance estimation in crowds","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standard comparison on common datasets for people detection and distance estimation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No analytical studies or post-processing to analyze the risk of infection distribution after people detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of statistical analysis provided for the outcome of the distance violation index","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No statistical assessment on virus spread based on distance measurements","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate comparison of dnn models’ accuracy based on non-comparable ground truths","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai and machine learning to monitor public spaces may lead to increased reliance on surveillance and raise ethical concerns about privacy and consent.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing wireless signal-based human detection in public places may lead to ineffectiveness of the technology and reliance on alternative monitoring methods.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High r0 value for covid-19 estimated at 2-2.5 indicates rapid spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic costs of social distancing for r0<1 and r0≈2","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Moderate level of social activities and economic status","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistical analysis of spatio-temporal data from people movements can reveal high-risk zones for contagious disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extensive testing and assessment in indoor and outdoor datasets may overlook specific contagious disease transmission risks in certain environments or communities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developed model for human detection and tracking may introduce privacy concerns and ethical implications, especially in public spaces.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential misuse of ai-based social distancing monitoring for privacy invasion","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for critical health and safety decisions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of technological challenges impacting real-time performance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to observe social distancing guidelines","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of infection spread and constraint efficiency","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on essential tasks and job-related travel","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global outbreak of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
